fftProcessing.title: Use fft processing
fftProcessing.description: Use FFT for Least-square template fitting (in log lambda)

ismFit.title: Wether to activate ISM extinction fit
ismFit.description: Wether to activate fit of ISM extinction ie. Ebv parameter from Calzetti profiles. Parameter scan from 0 to 0.9, step = 0.1. (best value stored in `FittedTplshapeIsmCoeff` in `lineModelSolve.linemodel_extrema.csv`)

igmFit.title: Wether to activate IGM fit
igmFit.description: Wether to activate fit of IGM with Meiksin tables. Index scan from 0 to 0.9, step = 0.1 (best profile index stored in FittedTplMeiksinIdx parameter in lineModelSolve.linemodel_extrema.csv)

count.title: Number of continuum templates to keep
count.description: Number of continuum templates, ranked by deacreasing pdf at each z, kept to fit lines (1 = only the best template is used).

ignoreLineSupport.title: Ignore lines support
ignoreLineSupport.description:
* **yes**: mask the lines to fit the continuum 
 * **no**: the lines are inverse-weighted in the fit (orthogonalization of the continuum wrt the lines such that the joint fitting of the continnum amplitude and the lines amplitude can be done separately)

negativeThreshold.title: Negative threshold
negativeThreshold.description: Threshold for the fitted continuum amplitude in sigma units. When the amplitude is below the threshold, amazed raises an error

nullThreshold.title: Null threshold
nullThreshold.description: Threshold for the fitted continuum amplitude in sigma units. When the amplitude is below `threshold * sigma`, continuum component is forced to nocontinuum
